name: Veidos the Eruption Dragon of Extinction
effectText: During the Main Phase, if this card is in your hand (Quick Effect): You can target 1 card in a Field Zone; Special Summon this card to your opponent's field, and if you do, destroy that card, then you can add to your hand or Set 1 "Ashened" Continuous Trap from your Deck. If this card is sent from your opponent's field to your GY: You can destroy all monsters on the field. You can only use each effect of "Veidos the Eruption Dragon of Extinction" once per turn.
